quote: For Graveleurs, it is all about the journey, not the destination and exploring the gravel and unsealed roads on bicycles is definitely their game. Ultimately it is about discovering new places and creating new adventures on a bicycle.
This event is primarily designed as a social event and most of our riders come to enjoy the ride, as much as a good meal and a beer or two at the end of the day. That is how we roll at Graveleur.

We are aiming to stick almost entirely to State Forest roads that in the dry are mostly very smooth and a joy to ride. But a turn in the weather can bring on a dramatic change in conditions for the worse.
Please don't bring your roadie, even if you have 28mm tyres on it.
